articles.title: Netflix cuts 300 more jobs after subscriptions fall
articles.description: In April the streaming giant reported its first subscriber loss in more than a decade.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: US Senate passes first gun control bill in decades
articles.description: Fifteen Republicans joined Democrats to approve the bill in the wake of a spate of mass shootings.
articles.content: It follows mass shootings last month at a supermarket in Buffalo, New York, and a primary school in Uvalde, Texas, that left a combined 31 people dead.
